alert.note: Alert for Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:51PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Kent County through 745 PM EST... At 651 PM EST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Rockford, or 8 miles north of Grand Rapids, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Walker... Rockford... Grattan... Cedar Springs... Sand Lake... Paul C Miller-Sparta... Wells Airport... Belmont... Comstock Park... Cannonsburg... Northview... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
